source:
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_SEQ_00Uin Nee would see the Woolen Way returned to its former glory.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
※本クエストは受注時のクラス・ジョブでのみ進行します。

リダ・ラーンのウィン＝ニイは、羊毛街道の事が気になっているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_TODO_00<tab>Collect balls of fleecy wool near Lydha Lran.
target: TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_TODO_00<tab>リダ・ラーンの厩舎内で<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FE801 /var>を集める

source: TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the balls of fleecy wool to Uin Nee.
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Oh, once it was so fluffy and floofy and poofy, and now it's so...<var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var>! Whatever is this world coming to?
target:
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_001アナタ、羊毛街道って呼ばれている道のことを知ってる？
このリダ・ラーンから北に、
ウリエンジェのおうちに向かって伸びる道のことよ。

source: TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_002<tab>I speak, of course, of the Woolen Way! Wasn't that <var 1A 02 /var>obvious<var 1A 01 /var>? Do try to keep up, dear mortal. Anyhow, the Woolen Way lies just north of here. Once upon a time, it was a grand road whereby mortals would transport giant balls of fleecy wool to and fro, fro and to. Doesn't that sound positively lovely?
target:
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_002なんでも、むかしはヒトが羊の毛を運んでいた道だったそうなの。
でも羊毛街道って聞くと、羊の毛でいっぱいの道みたいで、
とってもカワイイ感じがしない……？

source: TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_003<tab>Of course it does! That's why I've a mind to spin a dream of a road so soft and fleecy you'd think it was made from the wool of a thousand sheeps! Er, flocks...of sheeps? Anyhow, to do that I'll need a big ball of wool. Actually, <var 1A 02 /var>three<var 1A 01 /var> big balls of wool! You'll be a dear and fetch them for me, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_003だから、夢の中にフワフワの道を作りたいの！
リダ・ラーンの厩舎内に落ちている「」を、
3個、集めてきてちょうだい……よろしくね！

source: TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_020<tab>Well? I can't wait forever for my wool, you know. I've dreams to spin and places to be!

TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_021<tab>Why, just look at how large and fluffy this one is! And this one even more! You've truly outdone yourself, dear mortal. With this, I can spin the wooliest way my dreamers have ever dreamed!
target:
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_021とっても柔らかい羊毛玉ね、ありがとう！
たくさん集めたら、きっと素敵な羊毛の道が作れるわ！

source: TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_022<tab>Nu Mou legend has it that in the days when mortals lived in these parts, great wagons went up and down the Woolen Way, each packed to the brim with the fluffiest of fleeces to be carried to market.
target:
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_022ン・モゥのむかし話によると、ヒトが住んでいた頃の羊毛街道には、
羊の毛のトリヒキで、毎日ヒトが行ったり来たりしてたんだって。
荷馬車にフワフワの羊の毛を、た～くさん積んでね！

source: TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_023<tab>These days─alas!─only the name remains. <sniff> Is that not the saddest story you've ever heard? But no matter, for we shall spin a <var 1A 02 /var>new<var 1A 01 /var> Woolen Way in the dreams of the children─and one even more glorious than ever before!
target:
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_023現実の羊毛街道は、もう名前だけが残るばかりだけど……
夢の中にフワフワでフカフカの羊毛玉の道を作れたら、
それが新しい、ワタシたちの羊毛街道になるわ！

source: TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_024<tab>Why, I can just picture them bouncing up and down on a road of fleece and fluff like a giant cloud! Wouldn't you like to join them? But watch out─it will be so dreamy and delightful you just might never want to wake up! Tee hee!
target:
TEXT_BANPIX101_03689_UINNEE_000_024ウフフ、フワフワの道で跳ね回る子どもたちの姿、
想像するだけで、ウキウキしてきちゃうわ♪
そのときは、アナタも一緒に遊んでね？
